Product: IFB Neptune FX Free Standing 12 Place Settings with Germ-Free Hygienic Wash, Made for Indian Kitchens, Energy Efficient Dishwasher
Review_Summary: Took 3 days for installation. Be prepared to shell out roughly 6000 to 7000 Rupees for installation pertaining to various costs of trolley detergent cleaning aids etc.,  and around 700rs montly for detergent and other washing aids. Overall wash quality is pretty decent as long as you don't get too optimistic work super dirty utensils. Overall a good product and value for money.

Review_Summary: I am happy with the product. only complaint is its maintenance is costly. one time usage / day for a month would cost approx 7000 as we need change rinse liquid and salt every month.
